attributes.action: Allow driving lessons and driving tests open for key workers
attributes.background:
To able to let key workers like myself as a carer that has a driving test booked to be allowed to sit the driving test . 
Last lock down key workers were allowed so please let us sit our tests to be able to work more with the elderly and vulnerable.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
